legacy.full_text: No dia 27 de dezembro de 2022, o Embaixador da China em Portugal, Zhao Bentang, encontrou-se com o novo Chefe do Protocolo de Estado, Embaixador Jorge Silva Lopes. As duas partes trocaram impressões sobre as relações sino-portuguesas. https://t.co/DC4OHQpjHL

legacy.full_text:
The Workshop on Healthy Culture of Tilapia for African Countries was successfully held to share the developing experience and latest technology of Chinese fishery industry. 
China will make more efforts to promote Africa-China cooperation in more fields. https://t.co/QYTyz3j8dW

legacy.name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚

legacy.full_text: RT @MFA_China: Since COVID began three years ago, the Chinese government has poured all efforts into protecting the life and health of ever…

legacy.description:
Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy. 
YouTube https://t.co/owWGn7pWzE 
Facebook https://t.co/Mkd9zD52cs 
Instagram https://t.co/Ibatpyiyli
legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: Since COVID began three years ago, the Chinese government has poured all efforts into protecting the life and health of every Chinese. Globally, China has the lowest rates of severe cases and mortality. Average life expectancy in China went up from 77.3 to 78.2 years. https://t.co/n6kZ7PEBLp

legacy.description: Deputy Director-General, Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs
legacy.name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚

legacy.full_text: RT @MFA_China: With Omicron less pathogenic & deadly than previous variants and China’s treatment, testing & vaccination capacity steadily…

legacy.description:
Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy. 
YouTube https://t.co/owWGn7pWzE 
Facebook https://t.co/Mkd9zD52cs 
Instagram https://t.co/Ibatpyiyli
legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: With Omicron less pathogenic & deadly than previous variants and China’s treatment, testing & vaccination capacity steadily on the rise, China is shifting its focus from stemming infection to preventing severe cases & caring for health, which is science-based, timely & necessary. https://t.co/w5JJrcwNqS

legacy.description: Deputy Director-General, Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs
legacy.name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚

legacy.full_text: RT @MFA_China: China’s COVID situation remains predictable and under control. Beijing is the first city to have gone through the infection…

Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy.

legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: China’s COVID situation remains predictable and under control. Beijing is the first city to have gone through the infection peak. Life and work here are coming back to normal. We are confident the policy adjustment and shifting of focus will go ahead in a steady and orderly way. https://t.co/W40N3dtd7x

legacy.description: Deputy Director-General, Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs
legacy.name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚

legacy.full_text: RT @MFA_China: A small number of Western media tend to misrepresent China’s COVID policy adjustment and yet avoid reporting on the deficien…

legacy.description:
Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy. 
YouTube https://t.co/owWGn7pWzE 
Facebook https://t.co/Mkd9zD52cs 
Instagram https://t.co/Ibatpyiyli
legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: A small number of Western media tend to misrepresent China’s COVID policy adjustment and yet avoid reporting on the deficiencies and heavy price paid in their own countries’ COVID response. This is nothing but double standards. https://t.co/xWzwM6lAXm

legacy.description: Deputy Director-General, Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs
legacy.name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚

legacy.full_text: RT @MFA_China: China believes that countries should work together in solidarity for the region’s peace, stability, development and prosperi…

Follow us to know more about China's Diplomacy.

legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: China believes that countries should work together in solidarity for the region’s peace, stability, development and prosperity and against exclusive coteries. We hope the ROK will work with China to advance the sound and steady growth of bilateral relations. https://t.co/VclYvKRHYk

legacy.description: Deputy Director-General, Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs

legacy.name: Spokesperson发言人办公室

legacy.full_text: National reunification is one of the noblest causes a person can dedicate his or her life to, whereas to serve the “Taiwan independence” separatist agenda is to give one’s life away to an unworthy cause. https://t.co/4bxlF3mJin
